<div class=content-center>
<h1 style="font-size: calc(1.5rem + 0.30vw); padding-bottom: 0;">Join the CEFI community today</h1>
</div>

<div class=content-left>
Become a member of CEFI and take part in shaping a growing community focused on advancing ecological forecasting in Canada. 

Membership connects you with a vibrant network of peers and provides many benefits, including the opportunity to vote and run in CEFI <a href="https://canadianefi.ca/steering-committee.html">steering committee</a> elections, collaborate on <a href="https://ecoforecast.org/cross-cutting-themes" target="_blank">working group</a> projects and manuscripts, receive discounts on conference registrations, and more. Join today and help us shape the future of ecological forecasting in Canada.

<h1 style="font-size: calc(1.15rem + 0.30vw); padding-bottom: 0;">
What you get
</h1>

</div>

| Benefits                              | Anyone | Subscribers | Members |
|---------------------------------------|:------:|:-----------:|:-------:|
| Access to conferences & events        | x      | x           | x       |
| Regular newsletter                    |        | x           | x       |
| Registration discounts                |        |             | x       |
| Access to Slack groups                |        |             | x       |
| Participation in working groups       |        |             | x       |
| Vote in steering committee elections  |        |             | x       |
| Run in steering committee elections   |        |             | x       |
| Entry in the members directory        |        |             | x       |

<div class=content-left>

<h1 style="font-size: calc(1.25rem + 0.30vw); padding-bottom: 0;">
What you offer
</h1>

By becoming a member of CEFI, you affirm commitment to <a href="http://ecoforecast.org/shared-values-and-principles/">EFI's Shared Values & Operating Principles and Procedures</a> and interest in building a community of practice around ecological forecasts.

<h1 style="font-size: calc(1.25rem + 0.30vw); padding-bottom: 0;">
How it works
</h1>

* There is no fee for registering as a member. 
* Fill a form, where you will be asked to provide your name, affiliation, photo (optional), email, social media, and a short one-sentence description of your ecological forecasting work interests.
* By becoming a CEFI member, you also become an <a href="https://ecoforecast.org/" target="_blank">EFI member</a>.
* Once registered, you will be listed in the CEFI (coming soon) and <a href="https://ecoforecast.org/member-profiles/" target="_blank">EFI members directory</a>.
* Once registered, you will receive an EFI mug as a gift in the mail.
</div>
